entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
